trans-unit.source: Provides a placeholder for metadata items that cannot be converted from C# to an underlying data type that persists metadata.
trans-unit.target: Proporciona un marcador de posición para los elementos de metadatos que no se pueden convertir de C# a un tipo de datos subyacente que conserva los metadatos.

trans-unit.source: The blob is converted into an array of bytes to preserve the content.
trans-unit.target: El blob se convierte en una matriz de bytes para conservar el contenido.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] supports the following image metadata schemas: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], tEXt ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] Textual Data), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] admite los siguientes esquemas de metadatos de imagen: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_exif](~/includes/tlasharptla-exif-md.md)], texto ([!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] datos de texto), [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ifd](~/includes/tlasharptla-ifd-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_iptc](~/includes/tlasharptla-iptc-md.md)], y [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xmp](~/includes/tlasharptla-xmp-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob" /> and converts the metadata it holds into an array of bytes to persist its content.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una instancia de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob" /> y convierte los metadatos que contiene en una matriz de bytes para conservar su contenido.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of bytes that represents the value of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una matriz de bytes que representa el valor de un objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapMetadataBlob" />.
